text: Ogorzelec () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kamienna Góra, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south- west of Kamienna Góra and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. In the years 1975-1998 the village was a region of Jelenia Góra. == Gallery == File:Ogorzelec (powiat kamiennogórski) (008) jar.jpg|House File:Ogorzelec (powiat kamiennogórski) (001) jar.jpg|Old house by the road File:Ogorzelec (powiat kamiennogórski) (010) jar.jpg|Factory on the edge of the village ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Ogorzelec, Kamienna Góra County
